name: cognitive-lens
description: Shows Cognitive Complexity for TypeScript and C# methods

cognitiveComplexity.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

cognitiveComplexity.threshold.warning.description: Complexity score threshold for showing a warning.

cognitiveComplexity.threshold.error.description: Complexity score threshold for showing an error.

cognitiveComplexity.showCodeLens.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for cognitive complexity.

cognitiveComplexity.showDiagnostics.description: Enable or disable diagnostics (warnings/errors) for cognitive complexity.

cognitiveComplexity.showInlayHints.metho.description: Enable or disable the method score inlay hint.

cognitiveComplexity.showInlayHints.detai.description: Enable or disable detailed contribution inlay hints.

cognitiveComplexity.totalScorePrefix.description: The prefix text to display before the total complexity score.

scripts.copy:wasm: cp ../../node_modules/web-tree-sitter/tree-sitter.wasm dist/ && cp tree-sitter-c_sharp.wasm dist/ && cp public/tree-sitter-typescript.wasm dist/ && cp public/tree-sitter-tsx.wasm dist/
